# generated by https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-docs
page_title: "iosxr_l2vpn_xconnect_group Resource - terraform-provider-iosxr"
subcategory: "L2VPN"
description: |-
  This resource can manage the L2VPN Xconnect Group configuration.
---

# iosxr_l2vpn_xconnect_group (Resource)

This resource can manage the L2VPN Xconnect Group configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_l2vpn_xconnect_group" "example" {
  group_name = "P2P"
  p2ps = [
    {
      p2p_xconnect_name = "XC"
      description       = "My P2P Description"
      interfaces = [
        {
          interface_name = "Bundle-Ether11"
        }
      ]
      evpn_target_neighbors_segment_routing = [
        {
          vpn_id                       = 7000
          remote_ac_id                 = 8000
          source                       = 7001
          segment_routing_srv6_locator = "LOC12"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
  mp2mps = [
    {
      instance_name                            = "MP2MP1"
      vpn_id                                   = 100
      mtu                                      = 1500
      shutdown                                 = false
      l2_encapsulation                         = "ethernet"
      control_word_disable                     = true
      autodiscovery_bgp                        = true
      autodiscovery_bgp_rd_four_byte_as_number = 65536
      autodiscovery_bgp_rd_four_byte_as_index  = 100
      autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_four_byte_as_format = [
        {
          four_byte_as_number = 65536
          assigned_number     = 100
        }
      ]
      autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_four_byte_as_format = [
        {
          four_byte_as_number = 65536
          assigned_number     = 200
        }
      ]
      autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_ce_ids = [
        {
          local_ce_id_value = 10
          interfaces = [
            {
              interface_name = "GigabitEthernet0/0/0/1"
              remote_ce_ids = [
                {
                  remote_ce_id_value = 20
                }
              ]
            }
          ]
          vpws_seamless_integration = true
        }
      ]
      autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_ce_range                       = 11
      autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_load_balancing_flow_label_both = true
      autodiscovery_bgp_route_policy_export                                   = "EXPORT_POLICY"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `group_name` (String) Specify the group the cross connects belong to

### Optional

- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `mp2mps` (Attributes List) Specify the MP2MP instance name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mp2mps))
- `p2ps` (Attributes List) Configure point to point cross connect commands (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--p2ps))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--mp2mps"></a>
### Nested Schema for `mp2mps`

Required:

- `instance_name` (String) Specify the MP2MP instance name

Optional:

- `autodiscovery_bgp` (Boolean) Enable BGP auto-discovery in this MP2MP
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_auto` (Boolean) Automatic route distinguisher
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_four_byte_as_index` (Number) AS:nn (hex or decimal format)
  - Range: `0`-`65535`
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_four_byte_as_number` (Number) Four Byte AS number
  - Range: `65536`-`4294967295`
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_ipv4_address` (String) IP address
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_ipv4_address_index` (Number) IP-address:nn (hex or decimal format)
  - Range: `0`-`65535`
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_two_byte_as_index` (Number) AS:nn (hex or decimal format)
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `autodiscovery_bgp_rd_two_byte_as_number` (Number) Two Byte AS number
  - Range: `1`-`65535`
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_policy_export` (String) Export route policy
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_four_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Four Byte AS number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mp2mps--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_four_byte_as_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_ipv4_address_format` (Attributes List) IP address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mp2mps--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_ipv4_address_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_two_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Two Byte AS Number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mp2mps--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_export_two_byte_as_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_four_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Four Byte AS number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mp2mps--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_four_byte_as_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_four_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Four Byte AS number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mp2mps--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_four_byte_as_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_ipv4_address_format` (Attributes List) IP address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mp2mps--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_ipv4_address_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_two_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Two Byte AS Number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mp2mps--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_import_two_byte_as_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_ipv4_address_format` (Attributes List) IP address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mp2mps--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_ipv4_address_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_two_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Two Byte AS Number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mp2mps--autodiscovery_bgp_route_target_two_byte_as_format))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_ce_ids` (Attributes List) Local Customer Edge Identifier (CE ID) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mp2mps--autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_ce_ids))
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_ce_range` (Number) Local Customer Edge Block Configurable Range
  - Range: `11`-`100`
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_load_balancing_flow_label_both` (Boolean) Insert/Discard Flow label when transmit/recceive
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_load_balancing_flow_label_receive` (Boolean) Discard Flow label when receive
- `autodiscovery_bgp_signaling_protocol_bgp_load_balancing_flow_label_transmit` (Boolean) Insert Flow label when transmit
- `control_word_disable` (Boolean) Disable control-word
- `interworking` (String) Configure the interworking option for this L2VPN MP2MP Instance
  - Choices: `ethernet`
- `l2_encapsulation` (String) Configure the L2 encapsulation for this L2VPN MP2MP Instance
  - Choices: `ethernet`, `vlan`
- `mtu` (Number) Set maximum transmission unit (payload) for this VPN MP2MP Instance
  - Range: `64`-`65535`
- `shutdown` (Boolean) shutdown the L2VPN MP2MP Instance
- `vpn_id` (Number) VPN Identifier (VPN ID)
  - Range: `1`-`4294967295`

<a id="nestedatt--p2ps"></a>
### Nested Schema for `p2ps`

Required:

- `p2p_xconnect_name` (String) Configure point to point cross connect commands

Optional:

- `backup_interfaces` (Attributes List) Specify the attachment circuit (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--p2ps--backup_interfaces))
- `description` (String) Description for cross connect
- `evpn_service_neighbors` (Attributes List) Specify service ID (used as local and remote ac-id) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--p2ps--evpn_service_neighbors))
- `evpn_service_neighbors_segment_routing` (Attributes List) Specify service ID (used as local and remote ac-id) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--p2ps--evpn_service_neighbors_segment_routing))
- `evpn_target_neighbors` (Attributes List) Specify remote attachment circuit identifier (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--p2ps--evpn_target_neighbors))
- `evpn_target_neighbors_segment_routing` (Attributes List) Specify remote attachment circuit identifier (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--p2ps--evpn_target_neighbors_segment_routing))
- `interfaces` (Attributes List) Specify (sub-)interface name to cross connect (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--p2ps--interfaces))
- `interworking_ethernet` (Boolean) Ethernet interworking
- `interworking_ipv4` (Boolean) IPv4 interworking
- `ipv4_neighbors` (Attributes List) IPv4 (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--p2ps--ipv4_neighbors))
- `ipv6_neighbors` (Attributes List) IPv6 (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--p2ps--ipv6_neighbors))

<a id="nestedatt--p2ps--backup_interfaces"></a>
### Nested Schema for `p2ps.backup_interfaces`

Required:

- `interface_name` (String) Specify the attachment circuit


<a id="nestedatt--p2ps--evpn_service_neighbors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `p2ps.evpn_service_neighbors`

Required:

- `service_id` (Number) Specify service ID (used as local and remote ac-id)
  - Range: `1`-`4294967294`
- `vpn_id` (Number) Ethernet VPN Identifier
  - Range: `1`-`65534`

Optional:

- `pw_class` (String) PW class template name to use


<a id="nestedatt--p2ps--evpn_service_neighbors_segment_routing"></a>
### Nested Schema for `p2ps.evpn_service_neighbors_segment_routing`

Required:

- `service_id` (Number) Specify service ID (used as local and remote ac-id)
  - Range: `1`-`4294967294`
- `vpn_id` (Number) Ethernet VPN Identifier
  - Range: `1`-`65534`

Optional:

- `segment_routing_srv6_locator` (String) PW locator to use for EVPN SID allocation


<a id="nestedatt--p2ps--evpn_target_neighbors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `p2ps.evpn_target_neighbors`

Required:

- `remote_ac_id` (Number) Specify remote attachment circuit identifier
  - Range: `1`-`4294967294`
- `source` (Number) Specify source attachment circuit identifier
  - Range: `1`-`4294967294`
- `vpn_id` (Number) Ethernet VPN Identifier
  - Range: `1`-`65534`

Optional:

- `pw_class` (String) PW class template name to use


<a id="nestedatt--p2ps--evpn_target_neighbors_segment_routing"></a>
### Nested Schema for `p2ps.evpn_target_neighbors_segment_routing`

Required:

- `remote_ac_id` (Number) Specify remote attachment circuit identifier
  - Range: `1`-`4294967294`
- `source` (Number) Specify source attachment circuit identifier
  - Range: `1`-`4294967294`
- `vpn_id` (Number) Ethernet VPN Identifier
  - Range: `1`-`65534`

Optional:

- `segment_routing_srv6_locator` (String) PW locator to use for EVPN SID allocation


<a id="nestedatt--p2ps--interfaces"></a>
### Nested Schema for `p2ps.interfaces`

Required:

- `interface_name` (String) Specify (sub-)interface name to cross connect


<a id="nestedatt--p2ps--ipv4_neighbors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `p2ps.ipv4_neighbors`

Required:

- `address` (String) IPv4
- `pw_id` (Number) Specify the pseudowire id
  - Range: `1`-`4294967295`

Optional:

- `backup_neighbors` (Attributes List) Specify the peer to cross connect (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--p2ps--ipv4_neighbors--backup_neighbors))
- `bandwidth` (Number) bandwidth
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `mpls_static_label_local` (Number) Local pseudowire label
  - Range: `16`-`1048575`
- `mpls_static_label_remote` (Number) Remote pseudowire label
  - Range: `16`-`1048575`
- `pw_class` (String) PW class template name to use for this XC
- `tag_impose_vlan` (Number) vlan tagged mode
  - Range: `1`-`4094`

<a id="nestedatt--p2ps--ipv4_neighbors--backup_neighbors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `p2ps.ipv4_neighbors.backup_neighbors`

Required:

- `address` (String) Specify the peer to cross connect
- `pw_id` (Number) Specify the pseudowire id
  - Range: `1`-`4294967295`

Optional:

- `mpls_static_label_local` (Number) Local pseudowire label
  - Range: `16`-`1048575`
- `mpls_static_label_remote` (Number) Remote pseudowire label
  - Range: `16`-`1048575`
- `pw_class` (String) PW class template name to use for the backup PW

Required:

- `address` (String) IPv6
- `pw_id` (Number) Specify the pseudowire id
  - Range: `1`-`4294967295`

Optional:

- `backup_neighbors` (Attributes List) Specify the peer to cross connect (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--p2ps--ipv6_neighbors--backup_neighbors))
- `mpls_static_label_local` (Number) Local pseudowire label
  - Range: `16`-`1048575`
- `mpls_static_label_remote` (Number) Remote pseudowire label
  - Range: `16`-`1048575`
- `pw_class` (String) PW class template name to use for this XC
- `source_ipv6_address` (String) Source IPv6 address of PW
- `tag_impose_vlan` (Number) vlan tagged mode
  - Range: `1`-`4094`

<a id="nestedatt--p2ps--ipv6_neighbors--backup_neighbors"></a>

Required:

- `address` (String) Specify the peer to cross connect
- `pw_id` (Number) Specify the pseudowire id
  - Range: `1`-`4294967295`

Optional:

- `mpls_static_label_local` (Number) Local pseudowire label
  - Range: `16`-`1048575`
- `mpls_static_label_remote` (Number) Remote pseudowire label
  - Range: `16`-`1048575`
- `pw_class` (String) PW class template name to use for the backup PW

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_l2vpn_xconnect_group.example "<group_name>"
```
